meta.name: Real Estate Property Search with SQL Database and Email Delivery

parameters.formDescription: Search through 1000+ real estate properties in our database

parameters.message:
=Hi there! üëã

Great news! We found {{ $('Microsoft SQL').all().length }} properties that match your search criteria.

üè† TOP MATCHES:
{{ $('Microsoft SQL').all().slice(0, 3).map(property => 
`üí∞ $${property.json.price.toLocaleString()} - ${property.json.bed}bed/${property.json.bath}bath in ${property.json.city}, ${property.json.state}`
).join('\n') }}

üìé COMPLETE RESULTS ATTACHED
All {{ $('Microsoft SQL').all().length }} properties are in the attached CSV file - perfect for Excel!

üéØ YOUR SEARCH:
- Price Range: ${{ $('Build SQL Query').first().json.searchCriteria.priceRange.min?.toLocaleString() || 'Any' }} - ${{ $('Build SQL Query').first().json.searchCriteria.priceRange.max?.toLocaleString() || 'Any' }}
- Bedrooms: {{ $('Build SQL Query').first().json.searchCriteria.bedrooms.min || 'Any' }}+
- Location: {{ $('Build SQL Query').first().json.searchCriteria.location.city || $('Build SQL Query').first().json.searchCriteria.location.state || 'Anywhere' }}

Happy house hunting! üè°‚ú®

parameters.subject: =üè† Your Dream Home Search Results - {{ $('Microsoft SQL').all().length }} Properties Found!

parameters.content:
## üéØ 1. START HERE!
User fills out their dream home criteria - price range, bedrooms, location, etc. This triggers the entire search process!

## üß† 2. SMART QUERY BUILDER
Takes user input and creates a dynamic SQL query. Only adds conditions for fields the user actually filled out - no empty searches!

## üîç 3. DATABASE DETECTIVE
Searches through 1000+ real estate properties in SQL Server and finds matches based on user criteria. Returns real property data!

## üìä 4. EXCEL MAGIC
Transforms search results into a beautiful CSV file that users can open in Excel or Google Sheets for easy viewing and sorting!

## üìß 5. DELIVERY SERVICE
Sends personalized email with search results attached. User gets their dream properties delivered straight to their inbox!
